resources.string: Never miss a thing because its all here! We know you need some pampering, but often times we are looking for a little savings.
To qualify for a Premier Loyalty Card, you must have accumulated a minimum of Php 5,000.00 of services availed.
By applying, you are waiving your Frequency Card and all other benefits earned through the use of the card, whether the new PLC has been received or not.

Your personal details used in your user registration, which are found in the profile section of your Lay Bare On-line access, will be used to valdiate your branch transaction record. Please review and ensure that these are all valid and current. \n \nThe branch selection below will determine the branch where the Premier Loyalty Card will be delivered. A confirmation message will be sent to your email to acknowledge your application

We are grateful for the pleasure of serving you and meeting your waxing needs. Thank you for showing consistent confidence in our services. \n\nIn this we would like to present to you a small token of gratitude and love. Member of the Premier Loyalty Card will get 10% OFF on all our waxing services for life and get discounts from our partner merchants.
I Agree to the terms and Conditions
App needs an upgrade for a new feature
